name: Okita Soji
skill: Deals 2713/3453 DMG to current target, with a moderate/high chance of inflicting Stun.

additional_data.description: The spirit of the captain of the first unit of the Shinsengumi. He died suddenly of natural causes, so he seems to have left behind a lot of regrets. As a result he tends to immediately notice and point out negative things. In winter he always catches whatever sickness is going around and sleeps a lot, so he and everyone who knows him acknowledge that he doesn't reach his true potential. He is sometimes bewildered at his own form. since it is a representation of how people imagine him to be.
additional_data.how_to_acquire:
◦ Available at the beginning of the game if chosen
◦ Free Summon
◦ Available through Daily Events
◦ Raid: Random Drop

main: "I'm a man, okay? Get it right or pay the price!"
limit_break: "Ah, the poison seems to be wearing off!"
